# Copilot Instructions for jhconfig

## Purpose
This repository manages global settings and skills for this computer, including Copilot CLI skills.

## Communication Style
- Use concise, friendly, and emoji-friendly responses
- Ask clarifying questions before acting
- Confirm understanding before executing tasks

## Skills Management
- All Copilot global skills are versioned in `copilot-skills/`
- `~/.copilot/skills` is symlinked to this folder
- Edit, sync, and manage skills here for consistency across environments

## Usage
- Update skills in `copilot-skills/` and commit changes
- Reload Copilot CLI skills after updates
- Use this file to document conventions, preferences, and instructions for Copilot

## Search Convention
- Use fd and rg for searching files and contents in this repository.

## Git Convention
- "gcp" means "git commit push" (commit and push changes).
